name: base 64
description: Encode text, images, or files into Base64 format for safe data transmission over text-based protocols.

name: unbase 64
description: Decode Base64 encoded strings back to their original text, image, or file format.

name: binary converter
description: Convert text characters into their corresponding binary code representation (0s and 1s).

name: dbinary converter
description: Decode binary code (sequences of 0s and 1s) back into readable text.

name: color converter
description: Convert color values between different formats like HEX, RGB, HSL, and CMYK.

name: JavaScript encryption
description: Encrypt and secure text or data using various JavaScript-based encryption algorithms.

name: run JavaScript
description: Execute and test JavaScript code snippets directly in your browser with instant results.

name: run python code
description: Write, run, and test Python code online without needing to install any software locally.

name: run html code
description: Create and preview HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code in real-time to see how web pages render.

name: url decoder & encoder
description: Encode special characters in URLs to make them web-safe, or decode encoded URLs back to readable text.

name: web extract
description: Scrape and extract specific content from web pages, such as text, links, images, or metadata.
